1.title: Muddy Redneck Rodeo
1.plot: Lil Bit and the team saddle up for a muddy rodeo at the bog, organizing muddy mechanical bull riding, ATV barrel racing, and a roping course knee-deep in the mud.

2.title: Mudeval Times
2.plot: The crew puts a medieval spin on Mountain Creek Mud Bog, hosting a hoard of friendly fighters who battle it out in the mud with foam weapons, shields, and full medieval garb. Who will protect the castle and be crowned King and Queen of the Mud?

3.title: Big Sexy's Mud Games
3.plot: Big Sexy has a big idea to host muddy games at the bog. Competitors take on 3 events: muddy belly flopping, a ski jump into the mud pond, and the team's very own version of the luge - "The Mud Loogie." Only the best will take home the Gold...hubcap!

4.title: Muddy Marriage Proposal
4.plot: Lil Bit and Butterball are asked to help a guy propose to his girlfriend by hosting a carnival in the mud. The crew says yes - building a redneck Ferris wheel, muddy carnival games and more - but will she say yes?

5.title: The Muddy Obstacle
5.plot: The local firefighters and police officers go head to helmet in the bog, asking the crew to build a muddy obstacle course for them to battle it out for bragging rights. The tough course leads up to a zipline over the mud pond to the finish line.

0.title: Pilot
0.plot: Explore the fun and crazy lifestyle of Alabama mud bogging through the trials and tribulations of two redneck couples that are learning the hard way what it takes to turn a profit in this unpredictable business.

1.title: The Weddin' Bog
1.plot: Mountain Creek Mud Bog becomes a wedding venue when a couple insists that their ceremony take place in the middle of the bog. Bo, Lil' Bit, Fat Legs and Bubba have just a week to prepare for the big day, whice includes a mud-boggin' limousine.

2.title: High School Reunion
2.plot: A local high school wants to rent out Mountain Creek for their 10-year high school reunion. With everyone dressed to the nines, Fat Legs and Lil' Bit craft a fancy redneck menu for the event, while Bo and Bubba design a moving dancefloor fit for the mud.

3.title: Rollercoaster Bog
3.plot: An out of towner approaches Mountain Creek Mud Bog to help him fulfill his bucket list dream of riding a rollercoaster into the mud. Before turning their bog into an amusement park, the crew hosts their first ever toddler beauty pageant.

imdb.plot outline: Journey deep into the heart of Alabama and meet a down home gang of childhood friends as they attempt to start a first time mud bog business on their property. A popular form of entertainment, mud bogging combines big four-wheel trucks, fun competitions in the mud, family atmosphere, and a whole lot of mud. Anna, aka "Lil Bit," and her husband Bo, have joined forces with best friends Bubba and his fiancée Audrey, aka "Fat Legs," to transform their muddy land into a booming business called Mountain Creek Mud Bog. While their successful grand opening kicks off the summer season and brings in the bucks, this gang knows that if they don't step it up for the second bog, their new venture will be closed before it even starts. With the stakes running high and the next bog right around the corner, the group splits up the to-do list, everything from promotion and advertising, to fishing for catfish and landscaping. They even have plans to organize a Miss Mountain Creek Contest and build multi-level "rock crawl" where tough four-wheel trucks can test their horsepower. Anything goes with these fearless friends as they rely on good 'ole redneck ingenuity to get the prep work done. But when a night on the town turns into a jealous blow out between Fat Legs and Bubba, it threatens to derail everyone's plans. Can these inexperienced twenty somethings get it together in time to prove themselves at their second mud bog, or will Mountain Creek Mud Bog become the laughing stock of Marbury, Alabama.
imdb.title: Mud Lovin' Rednecks
plot: Journey deep into the heart of Alabama and meet a down home gang of childhood friends as they attempt to start a first time mud bog business on their property.::Anonymous
